mapper.insert: insert into payinfo (id, order_no, user_id, pay_platform, platform_status, platform_number, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payPlatform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{platformStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platformNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update payinfo set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_platform = #{payPlatform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, platform_status = #{platformStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform_number = #{platformNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, order_no, user_id, pay_platform, platform_status, platform_number, create_time, update_time from payinfo where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, order_no, user_id, pay_platform, platform_status, platform_number, create_time, update_time from payinfo
